title: Lol patcher
body: I cant get my pvp.net patcher kernel to open does anyone no why?

replies.body:
Hey there,

you can try this following steps:

* Try running as an admin by right clicking on the icon and selecting "Run As" and "Administrator"
* Make sure your [Windows Settings](https://support.riotgames.com/entries/35999450-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-and-PvP-Net) are set properly.
* If you recently did a system restore, had a virus or did a Windows reinstall, you may want to try Reinstalling League of Legends.
* Run through the RADS Fix in [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HHcfG9RV9Rw)
* Try changing your screen resolution to 1024x768 (Windows) (Mac)

If nothing of this helps, you can also check out [this site](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-technical-issues), with more detailed help.
When you have more questions, feel free to ask me!
thank you so much for telling me, I reinstalled league and I ran as administrator and it worked!! thank you so much.
No problem. Have fun playing League again :)
